Header: “The Yellow Birds” scheduled to be released this month
Content: “The Yellow Birds” is a 2018 American war film directed by Alexandre Moors and based on the novel The Yellow Birds by Kevin Powers. The film stars Tye Sheridan, Alden Ehrenreich, Toni Collette, Jason Patric and Jennifer Aniston. Two young soldiers, Bartle and Murph navigate the terrors of the Iraq war under the command of the older, troubled Sergeant Sterling. All the while, Bartle is tortured by a promise he made to Murph’s mother before their deployment. It is scheduled to be released on 15th of this month by Saban Films.
